summary: This document is a set of Federal Bureau of Prisons TRUVIEW reports detailing financial transactions for inmate Jeffrey Epstein between May and August 2019. It shows money received and sent via Western Union, with a consistent outside contact identified by a user ID. This document is a collection of administrative records from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, spanning from June 30, 2019, to August 11, 2019. It includes daily lieutenant's logs detailing inmate counts, sensitive information, operational notes, and chronological events, as well as commissary sales invoices for inmates. The logs document the incarceration and monitoring of Jeffrey Epstein and other inmates, noting his placement on suicide watch, psychological observation, and his final medical emergency on August 10, 2019.

connections.description: Both were inmates at MCC New York during overlapping periods in July and August 2019. Reyes was assigned to cell Z06-220UAD on August 5, 2019; Epstein was found unresponsive in cell Z06-220 on August 10, 2019.
Both were inmates at MCC New York during the same period, as documented in the daily lieutenant logs.

events.title: Epstein placed on Suicide Watch
events.description: At 1:38 AM, inmate Epstein #76318-054 was placed on Suicide Watch with institutional staff. Medical and Captain were notified.

events.title: Epstein released from Psychological Observation
events.description: At 12:21 PM, inmate Epstein #76318-054 was released from Psychological Observation (HA) to ZA (likely Special Housing Unit).

events.title: Epstein Found Unresponsive
events.description: At 6:33 AM, inmate Epstein #76318-054 was found unresponsive in cell Z06-220. CPR was performed, 911 was called, and he was transported via ambulance to a hospital.

events.description: Inmate Efrain Reyes #85993-054 was assigned to house Z, range 06, bed 220U AD.

events.title: Reyes removed to Special Housing
events.description: At 3:08 PM, inmate Reyes #85993-054 was removed from GS to ZA pending S.I.S investigation.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was receiving and sending money via Western Union while in federal custody in 2019.
The reports cover a specific monitoring period from May 21, 2019, to August 19, 2019.
A consistent outside contact, identified by user ID 'TF14688', is associated with the money transfers.
The transactions are relatively small amounts ($200 and $300), suggesting personal or operational expenses.
The documents are Bureau of Prisons TRUVIEW reports, indicating official monitoring of inmate financial activity.
Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was found unresponsive in his cell (Z06-220) at the MCC New York on the morning of August 10, 2019. CPR was performed and he was transported to a hospital.
Epstein was placed on Suicide Watch on July 23, 2019, and was later on Psychological Observation at various points in July 2019.
Inmate Efrain Reyes (inmate #85993-054) was assigned to the same cell unit (Z06-220UAD) on August 5, 2019, just days before Epstein was found there.

The MCC facility experienced significant operational issues during this period, including frequent fire alarm and sprinkler system failures, control panel malfunctions, and doors that could not be opened remotely, requiring manual operation and fire watches.
The daily logs provide a detailed, minute-by-minute account of inmate movements, counts, and incidents within the MCC, highlighting the routine and emergency procedures in place.
